title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 982/96 of 31 May 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2942/95 opening and providing for the administration of Community tariff quotas for certain agricultural products originating in the African, Caribbean and Pacific (ACP) States
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 982/96 of 31 May 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 2942/95 opening and providing for the administration of Community tariff quotas for certain agricultural products originating in the African, Caribbean and Pacific (ACP) States
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The table contained in Regulation (EC) No 2942/95 is replaced by the table below:
>TABLE>

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply with effect from 1 January 1996.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 May 1996.
For the Commission
Mario MONTI
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 84, 30. 3. 1990, p. 85.
(2) OJ No L 89, 10. 4. 1996, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(4) OJ No L 319, 30. 12. 1995, p. 1.
(5) OJ No L 308, 21. 12. 1995, p. 9.
